# PIE807 incorrectly triggers on lambdas with *args and/or **kwargs

---

_Issue opened by @henribru on 2023-02-21 21:39_

Replacing such lambdas with `list` isn't equivalent since `list` doesn't take arbitrary arguments. See https://play.ruff.rs/#N4KABGBECGA2sHsDuBTAJgWgMYIHYDMBXAZ2gCNYVjIAuMAbQF0AacKMwgS1gBdPdqdJqwiQ0hALYSAnhgBu0AE6dylDIoDmAD1pQAegAoA+gGoAPsZP1oGAF4BBDAC0ADBgCcRxgCprdx64ejCYA-ACUYQAkkCJQKFo8KLiYnBq4CIoousJskPGJyRjEKJRYPNksufkoirhwFbGQqemZDbmw-CgYlLgaPAAWugAcQ43FpeVCbKIAojHTUABi8xCiAAoAkjNDLgDskGyVojxKGig88jXEnHi6kAAO0gDMAIwuK1D4sNAA1ihDGGguHSJz4eEEYFAqygMkeGH4nAumR4hFqunwcGKsVExEI93umWIxAw4ikslOEIxsCxC0guPxhOJ6VwXWRqNw-A06MxKGxUDgiCQRROikBmkBuGk3OpvNpzQyXSI8FkhFwPGk93Q0uKbAAvo0vr9-hgyEC0IjdFDVpB+ko0Dg0OgMDwJPcSZxMmUMlKptDRAB6F33D7QyD+hSKQOukPW-2OuT+4j9CQHaFHa1YfooLA-Z0ap3xLAoe5g3DalB6g3fP4AjgaMgoJSW2nVQqcKSEE4ULpYAUQpiV3KGmsmri8fgQq2iDjcPgCeFpBUdYiTBiMQeiYfGnCuzJZgQ3ATN0MC5DusrYPsYJCI-oYP7SJAZTCnSRJHiUnkbz7V401RQSMQXJ0FOMLQFowrKL03RJH0gx0C436QFuAIAI6EAgiSTnKuAdCyGDoZhVB3GgCCEN2MaQBIhDjnhXSEVhJFkRRfJiAgWArlBGgERhjF0Gx5GUJR0ByAgnCYFQvaaroPCKIQFYQPqQ6--xPDqZjuCSI8dy4MGmMmTwjmYR0ZB3AtLnU7ToOcGQ4OPKzn28D9CDfIosOwD9QIlJ9ZaY3AJwencUsuf0-MIHI7lIHl-RyCFinVXNjxYRcK7SEJSWhm5CSol0b2ZGqWbFBCsnyaxlvQHprW2F0ulULVWQE3iQmO0ozvnMobvyHA8nEuq0n8cu5T+4ogeu10CiwOH6hnpH3tQCijlZKx8ecLbaXoR6XTU5mGD4Bk2QvZAABCj0zFoRYloeLmN83pYuQAamHKAzIo-2KC5ADyADK-eDy5GzDxPVeYzMV0engelqrPQ+YzjObnJDA9V5NefQAXnutpgmTF9pZd3pXQ9COmogmYouaW++NtPfbR0zT+kUYKqJBOq+K9ErPVDFpJOSgVDWR0oHT8MokIFwSs1T4GQizXnjm6OAKhbbllYtfFB1xehqDotg2k+CNCEM6BgQsKdrjgjaKGHcZAKGWXmvFc6MCurWmII5ZaeBnT5zwtxHcJkDoO1pM+GoJpZAZxEbKE2yCug43OteW8--kAGE6lFW+VjRsihQXmJhZZOFhkIX-
